Articles.Content:
Because apparently no one has done it before, so why not?

Ep.1: Launch

It is good day to be giant man!

Boost to orbit:

[![screenshot689_zpsdlrmf7ra.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot689_zpsdlrmf7ra.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot689_zpsdlrmf7ra.png.html)

[![screenshot707_zpsc41eundt.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot707_zpsc41eundt.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot707_zpsc41eundt.png.html)

In orbit:

[![screenshot712_zpssnnzbxju.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot712_zpssnnzbxju.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot712_zpssnnzbxju.png.html)

Next stop: Eeloo!
This looks cool. Good Luck! (This might be the first Elcano challenge I will ever read!)

The trip to Eeloo was uninteresting and boring, so I won't show much.

Ep2: Eeloo Landing

[![screenshot715_zpszobzxfh0.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot715_zpszobzxfh0.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot715_zpszobzxfh0.png.html)

[![screenshot729_zpsjmchbtdw.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot729_zpsjmchbtdw.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot729_zpsjmchbtdw.png.html)

Landed on Eeloo, the rover was not damaged despite the explosions.

[![screenshot736_zpsypanfcfb.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot736_zpsypanfcfb.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot736_zpsypanfcfb.png.html)

Ready to start the long drive.

I intend on driving at least 5 km every day and I have to finish this before 17th August for reasons.

Second stop.

[![screenshot764_zpsba0gurin.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot764_zpsba0gurin.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot764_zpsba0gurin.png.html)

[![screenshot769_zpstu1owtim.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot769_zpstu1owtim.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot769_zpstu1owtim.png.html)
I have a feeling this will stop early because Eeloo's surface has suddenly become a minefield, even the replacement rover has been destroyed.
Yup. It's like pre 1.0 Pol according to the Long-term Laythe.
Do you have the Stock Bug Fix Modules? It might be the one for rover wheels could help here. Last week, somebody else drove around Eeloo and reported no problems, so it seems possible.
Hm. I'll give that a try.
